text: @StephenAtHome @DrLaPook I have an answer regarding frosting.  Eat as much as you want as long as it’s not fake frosting, like the imposter, whipped cream.  It’s the cake you really have to be careful of.  In fact, I only eat the icing, buttercream, of course.
